colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031A *, ,CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I DKYIL BSGRUB CING MCHOD DE BDAG 'JUG BLANG BA'I TSUL LAS, BSGRUB MCHOD BYA BA'I TSUL YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS, KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS MDZAD PA'I DKYIL CHOG RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA NAS BSHAD BZHIN ZA MA TOG GI LHAN THABS SU GSUNG BA LTAR DANG, BUM CHOG KYANG DKYIL CHOG DE NYID NAS BSHAD PA CI LTA BA BZHIN RAB GNAS BKRA SHIS SNYE NYI MA'I LHAN THABS SU GSUNG BA LTAR LA, BDAG 'JUG GI NGAG 'DON PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSUNG BZHIN, 'JUG PA BDE BA'I PHYIR, PHYOGS GCIG TU, BSGRIGS SHING GAL CHE BA'I DMIGS RNAMS MTSAN GYIS GSAL BAR BYAS PA 'DI NYID, GSUNG RAB KYI TSIG DON LA BLO GROS KYI 'DZUGS PA YANGS SHING RNAM LEN DANG RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I PHYOGS LA BRTZON PA'I LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN, T'A BLA MA NGAG DBANG BSAM GTAN DAR RGYAS KYIS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN PA DANG, BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BGYI BAS, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I RGYAL KHAB PE'I CING GI TZAN DAN JO BO'I LHA KHANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN DKA' BCU NGAG DBANG CHOS 'BYOR RO, ,'DI YANG 'JAM MGON CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RDO RJE CHANG CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,SHU BAm, ,BHA WANTU, ,)
